Lyric:
[by:夜色虹桥]
[01:35.320]So 
[01:37.390]So you think you can tell 
[01:42.340]Heaven from Hell 
[01:45.780]Blue skies from pain 
[01:50.100]Can you tell a green field 
[01:54.350]From a cold steel rail? 
[01:58.770]A smile from a veil? 
[02:02.780]Do you think you can tell? 
[02:06.810]And did they get you to trade 
[02:10.980]Your heroes for ghosts? 
[02:15.090]Hot ashes for trees? 
[02:19.140]Hot air for a cool breeze? 
[02:23.120]Cold comfort for change? 
[02:27.320]And did you exchange 
[02:31.000]A walk on part in the war 
[02:34.290]For a lead role in a cage? 
[03:16.990]How I wish 
[03:19.000]How I wish you were here 
[03:23.670]We're just two lost souls swimming in a fish bowl 
[03:28.890]Year after year 
[03:32.790]Running over the same old ground 
[03:36.830]What have we found? 
[03:39.330]The same old fears 
[03:42.860]Wish you were here
